channel.title: Void

item.title: Void
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

I was looking around my client.java and found this

public void viewTo(int coordX, int coordY) {
	viewToX = ((2 * coordX) + 1);
	viewToY = ((2 * coordY) + 1);
	dirUpdate2Required = true;
	updateRequired = true;
}

What is this used for?

Read full topic
